gen:link.label:label: BV1798: If the item "S.26.08.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - for undertakings using an internal model (partial or full)" reported in S.01.01.01.01 Content of the submission is '5 — Reported due to use of full internal model' then the "Equity volatility risk" value of "Solvency Capital Requirement" reported in S.26.08.01.01 Solvency Capital Requirement - for undertakings using an internal model (partial or full), Component - specific information should be equal to "of which: Equity volatility risk" value of "mVaR 99.50%" reported in S.26.09.01.02 Market and credit risk and sensitivities - mVaR and VaR percentiles - including LAC TP but excluding LAC DT - each as marginal shock in the designated risk.

BV1798: If the item "S.26.08.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - for undertakings using an internal model (partial or full)" reported in S.01.01.01.01 Content of the submission is '5 — Reported due to use of full internal model' then the "Equity volatility risk" value of "Solvency Capital Requirement" reported in S.26.08.01.01 Solvency Capital Requirement - for undertakings using an internal model (partial or full), Component - specific information should be equal to "of which: Equity volatility risk" value of "mVaR 99.50%" reported in S.26.09.01.02 Market and credit risk and sensitivities - mVaR and VaR percentiles - including LAC TP but excluding LAC DT - each as marginal shock in the designated risk.
